feed.title: Category: Playing Around | Just a thing

entry.title: Testing octopress
entry.content:
So I decided that I wanted to change how I do things. And one of those changes includes a blogging engine that is a bit more static than dynamic, but that I could change and alter at my computer. Thus.. I present, this thing. Gotta hand it to @eevee, that's the source of this wonderful toy.

Hopefully I can make it work with my own domain name, and then we'll really be golden!
